author: IGN
description:
Hey everyone! Today’s Daily Fix: CDProjectRed released their first tech demo for The Witcher 4 at Epic’s State of Unreal. They showcase footage of the game running on a PS5 ray tracing enabled and 60fps. It looks great, but is this what the game will look like on launch? The demo revealed Ciri will have a horse friend called Kelpie similar to Geralt’s Roach as well as a never before seen region called Kovir. 
Also, Sony’s State of Play happens tomorrow so we dive into what games they could be surprising us with. Will we see Naughty Dog, Bungie, Santa Monica Studios and games like Marathon, God of War, Intergalactica, Ghost of Yotei? Comment below what you think we’ll see! Thanks for watching! 
And don't forget to grab your tickets for IGN Live happening this weekend in Los Angeles. Go to ign.com/live and use promo code "ROLLTHETHING" for one free ticket.

#IGN
title: Can the Witcher 4 Possibly Look This Good? - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Trust, a thriller film distributed by Republic Pictures.

After a scandal, a Hollywood starlet retreats to a remote cabin—but she’s not alone. Betrayed by the man she trusted most, she’s trapped in a brutal game of survival. She can hide, but she can’t run.

Trust stars Sophie Turner, Rhys Coiro, Billy Campbell, Peter Mensah, Forrest Goodluck, Gianni Paolo, Renata Vaca, and Katey Sagal. The film is directed by Carlson Young, written by Gigi Levangie, and produced by Miles Koules, Ketura Kestin, and Oren Koules.

Trust is in select theaters on August 22.
title: Trust - Official Trailer (2025) Sophie Turner, Rhys Coiro, Katey Sagal

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Features Overview Trailer for RealityScan 2.0, the latest asset and terrain scanning software from Unreal Engine. Reality Scan 2.0 is the new name for RealityCapture that allows for improved alignment, AI masking, and aerial LiDAR support to scan objects and the world itself. RealityScan 2.0 is coming soon to Unreal Engine.
title: RealityScan 2.0 - Official Features Overview Trailer | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description:
Journey through the sorrowful spirit world. Craft cards and claim powerful totems to defeat the woeful spirits lurking in the mystical lands. Unravel the tale of a grieving mother in her desperate attempt to defy death and bring back her son. Watch the new Death Howl trailer for this soulslike deckbuilder game to see gameplay and more. Death Howl will be available on PC, and a new demo is available on Steam on June 9, 2025.

#DeathHowl #Gaming #IGN
title: Death Howl - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for A Big Bold Beautiful Journey, a romantic fantasy drama distributed by Columbia Pictures.

What if you could open a doorway and walk through it to re-live a defining moment from your past? Sarah (Margot Robbie) and David (Colin Farrell) are single strangers who meet at a mutual friend’s wedding and soon, through a surprising twist of fate, find themselves on A Big Bold Beautiful Journey – a funny, fantastical, sweeping adventure together where they get to re-live important moments from their respective pasts, illuminating how they got to where they are in the present…and possibly getting a chance to alter their futures.

A Big Bold Beautiful Journey stars Margot Robbie, Colin Farrell, Kevin Kline, Phoebe Waller-Bridge, and more. The film is directed by Kogonada and written by Seth Reiss.

A Big Bold Beautiful Journey is releasing in theaters on September 19.
title: A Big Bold Beautiful Journey - Official Trailer (2025) Margot Robbie, Colin Farrell

author: IGN
description:
Our latest demo of the pixel-art, perspective-shifting '90s-set survival horror game Holstin honestly blew us away – and we say that very rarely of any game. If the rest of Holstin is as polished and carefully crafted, it will be considered a survival horror classic in a decade’s time. We were that impressed by what I’ve seen and played of it so far. Here are five reasons why you should play Holstin when it's finally released. Previewed by Katie Lloyd Williams

#IGN #Gaming
title: Holstin: 5 Reasons to Play This Phenomenal Pixel-Art Survival Horror Game

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Reveal Trailer for Roadside Research, a co-op gas station simulator developed by Cybernetic Walrus. Players will embody aliens in disguise to run a gas station and research humanity. Blend in, act natural, and gather as much intel as possible without raising suspicion. Attain upgrades for both the gas station and alien technology alike in Roadside Research, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Roadside Research - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Fumes gets a new trailer and a release date announcement. Check out the latest Fumes trailer for this fast-paced car combat game to see gameplay, car upgrades, and more. Arm your vehicle with deadly weapons and roam endless wastelands in Fumes. Collect upgrades for your car to melt enemies and giant bosses in this bizarre world. Retro vibe. Retro cars. Retro gameplay. Fumes will be available in Steam Early Access on July 28, 2025. You can learn more about Fumes on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1920430/FUMES/
title: Fumes - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this Unreal Engine 5.6 tech demo for The Witcher 4, running on PlayStation 5 with raytracing. This Witcher 4 tech demo shows off the new Fast Geometry Streaming Plugin to load open-worlds faster, and we see how UE 5.6 handles busy scenes full for high-fidelity character models and visual effects like ML Deformer. Additionally, we see Nanite Foliage in action, which provides a memory-efficient way to achieve high density (and fidelity) foliage, slated for release on UE 5.7.

What did you think of the first look at potential Witcher 4 gameplay? 

#witcher4 #ign
title: The Witcher 4 - Official UE 5.6 Tech Demo (4K) | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Unsheathe your silver swords and prepare your potions. Check out the latest Dead by Daylight trailer to see what's coming with The Witcher collection, which brings new outfits of Geralt, Yennefer, Ciri, Triss, The Leshen, and Eredin to the asymmetrical multiplayer horror game.
title: Dead by Daylight - Official The Witcher Collection Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Sony State of Play returns June 4! Watch live for news and updates on games coming to PS5. The show highlights a selection of great games from creators across the globe.

The 40+ minute show begins June 4 at 2pm PT / 5pm ET / 11pm CEST | June 5 at 6am JST. See you then!

#IGN #PlayStation
title: Sony State of Play June 2025 Livestream

author: IGN
description: Check out the time-manipulation gameplay mechanic in this new Pathologic 3 trailer for the upcoming adventure RPG. Save a town from a mysterious plague in Pathologic 3. Learn the stories of its unusual inhabitants. Shape their lives with your decrees. Diagnose patients. Face the Plague. Connect the dots. Find out who killed the immortal man. Correct your mistakes in the past. Pathologic 3 will be available on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox.
title: Pathologic 3 - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

#IGN
title: “Doors are a suggestion.” –Speedrunning tips from @Deceptix  Presented by @butterfinger

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at this Exclusive 'Jim the Roadruner' Clip from Duster, an HBO Max original crime drama series distributed by HBO. The clip depicts Jim with Luna as they watch an episode of The Road Runner Show cartoon when Jim's mind begins to drift, seeing premonitions of his greatest fears being played out in said cartoon. Watch this clip on Episode 4 of Duster, airing Thursday, June 5 on HBO Max.

Duster is set in the 1970's Southwest, the life of a gutsy getaway driver for a growing crime syndicate goes from awful to wildly, stupidly, dangerously awful.

Duster stars Josh Holloway, Rachel Hilson, Sydney Elisabeth, Camille Guaty, Adriana Aluna Martinez, and more. The series is created by J.J. Abrams and LaToya Morgan. 

Duster is streaming now on HBO Max.
title: Duster - Exclusive 'Jim the Roadruner' Clip (2025) Josh Holloway

author: IGN
description: Check out the Endless Inferno Update Release Date Trailer for Temtem: Swarm, a action bullet-hell creature collecting game developed by Crema and GG Tech. Get a glimpse at what's in store for the upcoming Patch 0.7 packed with a whole new map, new playable Temtem, an Endless Mode, and so much more. Patch 0.7 with the Endless Inferno Update for Temtem: Swarm is slated for June 17 for PC (Steam).
title: Temtem: Swarm - Official Endless Inferno Update Release Date Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's a fresh look at Autonomica in this new trailer for the upcoming open-world game inspired by solarpunk aesthetics, driven by advanced automation and sustainable farming. The new Autonomica trailer shows building elements, gameplay, and its colorful world. Autonomica will be available on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Autonomica - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for V.E.D.A: The Awakening of Souls, a souls roguelike developed by Tripearl Games. Players will experience the conflict between V.E.D.A, an AI supercomputer created to help humanity survive climate change and pandemics, and a hacker group called 'Daybreak Destroyers'. through a deep narrative about human evolution and survival. Don't miss the latest trailer showing off new boss encounters, boss battles, gameplay features, and more. V.E.D.A: The Awakening of Souls is launching in 2026 for PC (Steam) with a demo launching in August 2025 on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
title: V.E.D.A: The Awakening of Souls - Official Gameplay Trailer| The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Neon Inferno in this latest trailer for the upcoming hybrid side-scroller and gallery-shooter game where the action takes place in both the foreground and the background. As warring factions battle for control of a dystopian New York City, you enter the fray as an assassin for the Family -- a notorious crime syndicate determined to eliminate its rivals and dominate the metropolitan battlefield. Neon Inferno will be available on October 2 for PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch with a demo available now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Neon Inferno - Official Demo Launch Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Learn about the story, get a peek at gameplay, and check out the nightmarish world of Becrowned in this trailer for the upcoming surreal survival horror adventure game. Becrowned features a mixture of traditional survival horror gameplay with unique narrative direction and in-game cinematography. You follow Richard Torrance, a man of rational and unbreakable character who has lived his life in the shadow of his goals and desires in Becrowned. Explore locations filled with secrets. Solve puzzles, manage your resources wisely, and avoid unnecessary fights. Who knows what terrible creature might be lurking around the next corner... Becrowned will be available on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Becrowned - Official Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Meet Cider and see the character in action in this new Absolum trailer for the upcoming roguelite beat ‘em up game. Absolum mixes top-of-the-class combat action with modern roguelite elements, bringing all the vibes of the fantasy arcade hits of the past into an immersive adventure set in the original world of Talamh. Absolum will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PS4 (PlayStation 4) in 2025. A demo will be available at Steam Next Fest from June 9 to June 16, 2025.
title: Absolum - Official Cider Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Nintendo Switch 2 Japanese Trailer for Welcome Tour, the adventure simulation game giving players the rundown on the hardware and software of the Nintendo Switch 2. Get a look at new gameplay for the upcoming title launching alongside the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 - Official Welcome Tour Trailer (Japanese)

author: IGN
description:
Predator: Killer of Killers, an original animated action-adventure film set in the Predator universe, will premiere June 6, 2025, exclusively on Hulu. 

The anthology story follows three of the fiercest warriors in human history: a Viking raider guiding her young son on a bloody quest for revenge, a ninja in feudal Japan who turns against his Samurai brother in a brutal battle for succession, and a WWII pilot who takes to the sky to investigate an otherworldly threat to the Allied cause. But while all these warriors are killers in their own right, they are merely prey for their new opponent – the ultimate killer of killers. 

Predator: Killer of Killers is directed by Dan Trachtenberg with Josh Wassung, from animation company The Third Floor, serving as co-director. The film is written by Micho Robert Rutare and story by Trachtenberg and Rutare, based on characters created by Jim Thomas & John Thomas. The producers are John Davis, Dan Trachtenberg, p.g.a., Marc Toberoff, Ben Rosenblat
title: Predator: Killer of Killers - Exclusive Clip (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN) trailer to see the updates coming from Epic and the LEGO Group, including the LEGO Brick Editor and LEGO Bloom Tycoon Template. The UEFN LEGO updates will be available on June 17, 2025.

LEGO Brick Editor is the formal term for brick-by-brick building, and it enables creators--or just straight-up LEGO enthusiasts--to free-build using a curated palette of LEGO assets.

The other feature is LEGO Bloom Tycoon, a new template where creators can build the garden or farm of their dreams while adding tycoon-style gameplay.
title: Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN) - Official LEGO Update Trailer | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Unreal Fest 2025 Sizzle Reel for MetaHuman, a more efficient and effective way to create realistic human facial and body movements developed by Epic Games. MetaHuman has a new parametric body system, improved visual fidelity, and new real-time workflows for MetaHuman Animator. Get a look at how MetaHuman is being used in a variety of games from The Witcher 4, Death Stranding 2: On The Beach, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, and more. MetaHuman is available now.
title: MetaHuman - Official Unreal Fest 2025 Teaser | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Prepare for puzzles, survival, social play, deception, and betrayal. Check out the Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN) x Squid Game teaser trailer as Squid Game comes to UEFN on June 27, 2025. Creators will be able to build their own twist on the world’s most intense playground. The ability to publish will follow later this summer 2025.
title: Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN) x Squid Game - Official Teaser Trailer | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: During State of Unreal, Epic Games announced more Disney content coming to Fortnite. In the wake of Galactic Battle, it's Star Wars collaboration, which saw players watch Star Wars: Tales of the Outworlds before its Disney+ premiere, and AI Darth Vader, Epic Games announced Star Wars is coming to Unreal Editor for Fortnite, giving creators the power to make their own stories in the popular battle royale using AI language models for immergent gameplay.
title: Star Wars Unreal Engine for Fortnite Announcement | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Watch the Announcement Trailer for Anima: Gate of Memories 1 & 2 Remaster, a remaster of two classic third-person action RPGs developed by Anima Project. Players will experience both acclaimed games in one package with the original Anima: Gate of Memories and its companion story Anima: The Nameless Chronicles. Both games are fully remastered with improved visuals and gameplay for the modern era as players explore the tale of a legendary monster and a mysterious girl with no memory of her past, the other of an immortal soul cursed to wander the world forever. Anima: Gate of Memories 1 & 2 Remaster is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).
title: Anima: Gate of Memories 1 & 2 Remaster - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: State of Unreal revealed that the Unreal Editor for Fortnite will be adding a LEGO Brick Editor on June 17 where players can build objects 'brick by brick,' Squid Game on June 27, and Avatar: The Last Airbender in 2026.
title: Unreal Editor for Fortnite to Add a LEGO Brick Editor, Squid Game, and Avatar: The Last Airbender

author: IGN
description: Check out this new look at developer Netmarble's upcoming action roleplaying game sequel, Mongil: Star Dive. In it, see how the team utilized Unreal Engine to give each character's combat and playstyles a unique feel, transforming it into an interactive experience across consoles, PC, and mobile devices.
title: Mongil: Star Dive Unreal Engine Showcase | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Check out this in-depth look at how developer Paper Games utilized Unreal Engine 5 to create the sweeping open world and finite details of its many flowery dresses to give a high fidelity look on consoles and mobile for Infinity Nikki, its most ambitious game in the series yet.
title: Infinity Nikki Unreal Engine Showcase | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Feature Highlights Overview Trailer for Unreal Engine 5.6, the latest iteration of the ground-breaking game engine developed by Epic Games. Developers will harness the ability to build detailed and vibrant open-worlds running at 60 FPS, true engine-first animation, rigging, and MetaHuman authoring workflows to make seamless changes to ongoing projects. Unreal Engine 5.6 is available now.
title: Unreal Engine 5.6 - Official Feature Highlights Overview Trailer | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Sandfall Interactive co-founder and technical director Tom Guillermin looks back on how Unreal Engine 5 helped bring Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 to life and help it reach over 3.3 million units sold in its first 33 days.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Unreal Engine Retrospective | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Check out the Unreal Engine 5.6 trailer, now available. With it comes super-high-fidelity, large-scale open worlds that run at 60 FPS across consoles, PCs, and mobile devices. With features like nanite foliage and chaos physics, trees appear extra crisp, and subtle details, such as the rippling muscles of Ciri's horse in Wither 4, Kelpi, look even more lifelike.
title: Unreal Engine Nanite Tech Demo | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Wave goodbye to Early Access because MetaHuman Creator 5.6 is now fully integrated into Unreal Engine and ready to go. The new MetaHuman update brings unmatched fidelity, a large scan database, and advanced authoring workflows for faces, bodies, and clothing. Use tools like the expression editor to assist with facial expressions and the groom tool to reconfigure the fine details of your character's hair. What's more, MetaHuman Animator now generates real-time animation from almost any camera or audio source. Now, MetaHuman characters and animation work seamlessly in any Engine, including Unity, Godot, Maya, Houdini, and Blender.
title: MetaHuman Creator Tech Demo | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out this Unreal Engine 5.6 tech demo for The Witcher 4, running on PlayStation 5 with raytracing. This Witcher 4 tech demo shows off the new Fast Geometry Streaming Plugin to load open-worlds faster, and we see how UE 5.6 handles busy scenes full for high-fidelity character models and visual effects like ML Deformer. Additionally, we see Nanite Foliage in action, which provides a memory-efficient way to achieve high density (and fidelity) foliage, slated for release on UE 5.7.

What did you think of the first look at potential Witcher 4 gameplay? 

#witcher4 #ign
title: The Witcher 4 - Gameplay UE 5.6 Tech Demo | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Sample the first 15 minutes of gameplay from the 1.0 version of Dragon Is Dead, the hack-and-slash action roguelite platformer with hugely customizable skill trees and tons of pixel-art personality. Grab the 1.0 version on Steam on June 6: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2803280/Dragon_Is_Dead/
title: Dragon Is Dead: The First 15 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description: Mario Kart World is just two days away, and fan expectations are rightfully high. It’s the flagship launch game for Nintendo Switch 2, the first open world in the series, the follow-up to the hugely successful Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, and on top of all that, it’s Nintendo’s first $80 game since the N64 days, which has caused no shortage of internet discourse. We spent five more hours with it, this time with a final build, and here are our updated impressions. Previewed by Logan Plant
title: Mario Kart World: What We Think After Playing 5 More Hours

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo Switch 2 World Tour is a charming, light experience that grants fascinating context to the hardware it’s designed around, but is it worth $10? We played it to find out. Previewed by Logan Plant

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour: So, Is it Worth $10?

author: IGN
description: Check out this trailer for Witcher 4 running on Unreal Engine 5.6. Play as Ciri, a professional monster slayer; a Witcher. The Witcher 4 is releasing at a later date.
title: The Witcher 4 - Cinematic Trailer | State of Unreal 2025

author: IGN
description: Get your first look at Deadcam, a new "analog survival horror" game that uses a '90's found-footage VHS camcorder aesthetic to scare you through a series of files (i.e. encounters). Deadcam launches into Steam Early Access on June 23 with its first file, a J-horror inspired story set in an abandoned school, and four more files will be added over the course of the Early Access period. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2660830/DEADCAM__ANALOG_o_SURVIVAL_o_HORROR/
title: Deadcam - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Prime Video will premiere the five-part documentary Esports World Cup: Level Up on June 6, with new episodes released weekly. Directed by Emmy-winning filmmaker R.J. Cutler (Billie Eilish: The World’s a Little Blurry, Elton John: Never Too Late and Martha), the series goes behind-the-scenes of the inaugural Esports World Cup (EWC) in 2024 — a defining moment in global esports, where over $60 million in prize money ignited a high-stakes, multinational battle to crown the world’s top esports Club. 

The series is produced by This Machine (a part of Sony Pictures Television), with R.J. Cutler directing, John Dorsey serving as showrunner, and Jane Cha Cutler, Trevor Smith, Elise Pearlstein and Mark Blatty executive producing. Level Up will premiere exclusively on Prime Video in more than 240 countries and territories worldwide. 

Esports World Cup: Level Up offers a rare look inside a global competition that’s redefining what it means to be a champion for a new generation of athletes and
title: Esports World Cup: Level Up - Exclusive Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
F1 25 reviewed by Luke Reilly on Xbox Series X. Also available on Xbox Series S, PlayStation 5, and PC.

"F1 25 launches off the line with the first drastic shake-up of the core ‘My Team’ career mode since it was introduced in F1 2020, alongside a conclusion for the story mode that began as a short prologue way back in F1 2019 (and became a mode of its own in F1 2021). The driver career mode makes little attempt to differentiate itself from its debut in F1 24 but, when combined, F1 25 is a far broader and better package than last year’s installment. There are still several areas where it hovers frustratingly short of its full potential – and I’ll never be able to get behind its fascination with clothing and emotes over meaningful classic F1 cars and content – but it’s comfortably the strongest the series has been since the fan favourite F1 2020."
title: F1 25 Review

author: IGN
description:
Join world-class Borderlands Speedrunner, Deceptix, accompanied by IGN’s Nick Limon, as they speedrun the Ultimate Vault Hunter Mode Geared (UVHM) category as fast as possible while eating Salted Caramel Butterfingers in anticipation for Borderlands 4!

Presented by Butterfinger

#IGN
title: We Beat Borderlands 2 in 1 Hour While Eating Butterfingers - IGN’s Crunch Time

author: IGN
description: Patch 1.01.1 is here, and it’s a good one, especially if you’re playing solo. FromSoftware has introduced key updates that make lone adventuring in Elden Ring: Nightreign a little more manageable. In this video, we break down the biggest changes, including the new automatic revival mechanic, boosted rune rewards, relic drop rate improvements, and more.
title: Elden Ring: Nightreign Patch 1.01.1 – Biggest Changes & Solo Buffs Explained

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Via the Nintendo Today app, Nintendo revealed new 60fps gameplay from the Switch 2 versions of Pokémon Scarlet & Violet. The original Switch version was plagued with performance issues, such as droppin frame rates, texture pop-in, and other problems indicative of a game not optimized and running on old hardware. Hopefully the new version will be what fans have expected. In other news, remember that James Bond game from the Hitman devs? The one they announced years ago? Well it looks like they're finally ready to show it off. The game, officially titles 007 First Light, will get a proper reveal this week. And finally, we take a peek at the five immersive worlds of the all-new Universal Epic Universe, and one of its featured attractions – Stardust Racers, all at Universal Orlando Resort. 

Presented by: Universal Orlando Resort, and its new theme park, Universal Epic Universe.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Nintendo Releases 60fps Footage of Pokemon Scarlet & Violet for Switch 2 - IGN Daily Fix
